list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make a small hole in (something) with a sharp point; pierce slightly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: prick the potatoes with a fork
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chích khoai tây với một cái nĩa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially of a horse or dog) make (the ears) stand erect when on the alert.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the dog's tail was wagging and her ears were pricked
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đuôi chó đang vẫy và tai cô bị chích

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of piercing something with a fine, sharp point.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pin prick had produced a drop of blood
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Pin Pick đã tạo ra một giọt máu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a spiked stick used for driving oxen.
